full_summary:
# Canadian Coast Guard Winter Refit

## Description

The Government of Canada, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), invites tenders for the provision of winter refit services for three Canadian Coast Guard Ships (CCGS) located in Sorel-Tracy, Quebec: A. Leblanc, Caporal Kaeble, and Constable Carrière.

## Scope of Work

The contractor will be required to provide ship repair and maintenance services, including but not limited to:

* Commercial marine craft maintenance
* Salvage ships repair
* Rescue ship or boat maintenance
* Water transport vessel maintenance and repair services

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4113052868
* Publication Date: October 17, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time
* Amendment Date: November 2, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

## Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec
* Contact: Simon Presse (PSPC) - simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Country: Canada
* Contact Phone: (Note: None provided)

## Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Contact

Simon Presse  
Phone: Not available  
Email: simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau Qc K1A 0S5).

## Technical Specifications

* Navires commerciaux (Commercial marine craft)
* Navires de sauvetage (Salvage ships)
* Navires ou bateaux de sauvetage (Rescue ships or boats)
* Services de maintenance et de réparation de navires (Water transport vessel maintenance and repair services)

## Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Note that I've simplified and organized the rewritten entry for clarity in three separate sections.
